attributes.action: Remove VAT on womens sanitary wear.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, as women, do not see why we have to pay VAT on Sanitary wear.  
We feel that it is truely unfair to put VAT on products like Tampons and Sanitary Towels as this is not something that we choose to have.  It is vital for every women in this civilised world that she has the basic right to use them, whatever her choice maybe, without having to pay VAT on top...
VAT should be scrapped altogether on these products as we have to have them.
Please consider this Petition....it is something that affects every women in the world... sanitary wear is not a choice its a necessity...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
